title: Mahse, Temple Dang?
paragraphs:
A tir lamah chuan puk a awm a.

An zai a, .

Rationality chuan Athens khawpuiah Parthenon chu a din ta a ni.

Tin, pi leh pute inzawmna chuan Salvador rama Candomblé terreiros a siam bawk.

Temple chhunga thil awm zawng zawng hi invocation a ni.
Cathedral angin a sang thei a, chu chuan te tak te a ti thei a, .
thing hrual ang maia thim, chhung lam thlir tir thei che, .
ngaihtuahna tibuaitu ti ngawih ngawih thlaler ang maia lang lo, .
emaw, transcendence tiamtu rangkachak hmanga sumptuous emaw pawh ni se.

Temple hi kan thlarau mizia hriat theihna tur clues a ni a,

Vawi khat chu lungpui chhunga an tih ang khan, .

Mahse biak in hmun zawng zawng hi inang tlanga siam a ni lo.
Temple eng pawha a rah chhuah tam ber
a kawngkhar a ni reng ang.

Biak in kawngkharte chuan an tan theihna an vawng tlat a,
tute nge lut thei leh lut thei lo inkara hliam an siam thei a ni.
Chutiang chuan biak in chu khandaih a lo ni ta a ni.

Tin, he khandaih hi kum zabi tam tak chhung chu hman a ni tawh a, .
vun rawng dodalna, .

mi pakhatin a hmangaih, .

Mi zawng zawng lo hmuak nia inchhal biak in te pawh
ti lo hnamte chhungah ding rawh u.

Nepal rama Buddhist temple inhawng tak a ni
luh duh zawng zawngin an tlawh thei lo.
Ramri te, visa te, leh politics te hian tu nge tawngtai thei ang tih a rel a ni.
China rama biak in pakhat, Jerusalem-a mosque pakhat, .

hmuh theih loh bang hnung lamah an ding vek a ni.
Tin, chu kulh chhungah chuan khandaih chu a la hrual reng bawk.

Temple engmah hi radically inclusive a ni thei lo.
Leiah hian hmun a awm lo
chu chuan khawvel pum huap thil thianghlim a vawng thei a ni.

Nimahsela, hnam zawng zawngin biak in an sa a,
thil thianghlim takin min inzawmkhawm tih finfiahna.
Ramri nei lo hmu thei thil.
Mahni hmuna awm tlak thil.

Khawiah nge hetiang biak in hi kan sak theih ang?
Kulh bang engmah thlen theih lohna hmunah, .
hnam tumahin an claim thei lo, .
sakhaw engmahin ro a rel thei lo.
Awl.

Ni e, he hmun hi space a ni.
Tunah chuan chanvo nei tlemte chuan claim tum mah se, .
tin, space-in a culture crisis a tuar lai pawhin, .

Chu chu chunglam tawp nei lo, van boruak, van lam vault, van, .
commons hlui ber ber kan share thin.

min inpumkhat tir turin.

Ramri tin piah lamah hmun a awm thei a, mihring zawng zawng leh thil hriatna nei zawng zawng tan, tuna kan siam chhuah hlutnate kaihhruaina hnuaia pawl pakhat anga inngaihtuah theihna tur biak in a awm thei bawk.
Hei hi ritual chi thar nei tura sawmna a ni.

Space-a temple siam tura artistic invitation,
kulh awm lohna hmuna sak temple.

Hriat reng tur nun hi han ngaihtuah teh.
Hetah hian hming hi type rawh.

Tin, kan vawn reng bawk ang.
Orbital Temple chu Leia kan antenna te nen a inmil chuan, .
hming a lo chhuak ang.
Satellite hian a memory-ah a dah ang
tin, thuchah thawn rawh:
"Vawiin, he darkar hian i hming i thawn kha a chho a, chutah chuan a la awm reng a ni."

Orbital Temple hi kutchhuak a ni a, .
leh satellite a awm bawk.
Tin, a hmingah "biak in" nei mah se, .

pakhat anga hmuh i tum a ni.

Tunah hian evocation angin a awm tawh a, .

chu lungpui hmasa berah chuan.

Tin, puk chhungah kan la awm a, .
van boruak thim zau tak, .
khawiah nge Lei hi meialh a ni, .

Artist hian hna a la thawk reng a,
mi an la zai reng a, .

painting, sculpting, kan hmalam hun duhthusam design te, .
chei ni lovin invoke tur, .

Tin, a ni, .
